title: Going Back To The Academy (Part 2)
body:
Going Back To The Academy (Part 2)

While going back to the city, Evan checked Olivia's skills using the second effect of his growth link skill.

People who are specialized in curses are very rare so Evan was curious about her skills.

When he saw the details of her Soul Obliteration skill, he can't help but shudder.

'If my title's second effect hadn't activated at that moment, I might have died right there' Evan thought and felt even more confused as to why he didn't try to dodge that attack at that moment.

"I should keep my emotions in check while fighting," Evan said to himself and looked at her other skills.

Olivia had many skills and Evan found some interesting ones.

---) Curse of the Reaper: The target becomes marked by the Grim Reaper, making them more susceptible to death and critical injuries. Any wounds they receive become harder to heal.
